title: The Convergent
description: In the twilight streets of Trachtenborg, amid antique shops and dusty bookstores where lanterns chase the shadows, there are the hidden ones, children without homes or parents to love them.In one lonesome, dark corner, where light fears to shine, is a boy named Zephyr. Alone, forgotten, and weary of the city, he ventures into the haunted forest where he comes face to face with an otherworldly presence with mysterious intentions.
author: Joshua Skye
